definitions.definition: The legal means to recover a right or to prevent or obtain redress for a wrong.
A medicine , application , or treatment that relieves or cures a disease .
The accepted tolerance or deviation in fineness or weight in the production of gold coins etc.

secondary_definitions: ( law ) The legal means to recover a right or to prevent or obtain redress for a wrong.
A medicine , application , or treatment that relieves or cures a disease .
The accepted tolerance or deviation in fineness or weight in the production of gold coins etc.
